'''Adalbert Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Adalbert was the son of [[Rudibert Bolger]] and [[Amethyst Hornblower]]. He married [[Gerda Boffin]]; their son [[Filibert Bolger|Filibert]], was born in {{SR|1342|n}}.<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

==Etymology==
''Adalbert'' is a Germanic name composed of the elements ''adal'' "noble" and ''beraht'' "bright".
